hadiths.english_translation: From Mujahid: Concerning the verse 'We did not create bodies for them' (Qur'an 21:8), he said: They have no soul. And concerning 'nor do they eat' (Qur'an 21:43), he said: they are prevented. And concerning 'We have sent down to you a Book in which there is mention of you' (Qur'an 21:10), he said: your honor; and 'It is surely an honor for you and for your people' (Qur'an 43:44), he said: honor for you and your people.

hadiths.english_translation: From Said ibn Masruq, from Ikrimah: Ibn Abbas was asked: Which came first, the night or the day? He recited: 'Have not those who disbelieve seen that the heavens and the earth were joined together as one unified mass, then We parted them' (Qur'an 21:30), then he said: Was there anything between them except darkness? That is so that they may know that the night came before the day.
